name: Pickled Sour Cherries
description: Adapted from a recipe at Chez Loulou
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound (225g) sour cherries (rinsed, stems clipped in half)

recipeInstructions.text: Bring vinegar, water and sugar to a boil, until sugar is dissolved.
recipeInstructions.name: Bring vinegar, water and sugar to a boil, until sugar is dissolved.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat and add the peppercorns and bay leaves.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from heat and add the peppercorns and bay leaves.

recipeInstructions.text: Prick each cherry with a pin and drop them into the hot liquid.
recipeInstructions.name: Prick each cherry with a pin and drop them into the hot liquid.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the contents into a clean jar (I pour boiling water into it, or run it through the dishwasher, then let it dry first), cover, and refrigerate until ready to serve.
